Articles.Content:
Holy Kraken, I had an idea. This just flew through my head a few seconds ago.

Whackjob = Giant Rockets

Kraken Drive = Really cool bug engine

....

....

....

Whackjob + Kraken Drive = [uNKNOWN]

Whackjob, you have a new project. A Whackjovian-sized Kraken Drive.

Not sure if it would work.

SCIENCE in one sentence.
Why do you say that? Lots and lots and lots of legs and structural thingys would most likely still work.

One does not simply Krakendrive.... even Whackjob. The Kraken is a far greater and far more powerful force than any of us can truly handle. Playing with fire, here. Of course if anyone might make the Kraken hesistate for a millisecond it's Whackjob...
I eat the Kraken for breakfast!

I've taken a swing at the Kraken drive already. I just tend to not be able to replicate the kraken drive effects. And due to the odd effects of such a drive, I'm not entirely certain size is a factor on performance.

I've taken a swing at the Kraken drive already. I just tend to not be able to replicate the kraken drive effects. And due to the odd effects of such a drive, I'm not entirely certain size is a factor on performance.

Why would you expect to? It's the KSP equivalent of the Infinite Probability Drive.
